org.s1.web.session

Class SessionScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.s1.web.session.SessionScope

  • public class SessionScope
extends java.lang.Object
    Session level scope.
    Scales horizontally with Hazelcast (http://hazelcast.org)
    Should be initialized with Hazelcast instance (make it in ApplicationFilter).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SessionScope.Context
      Session

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(com.hazelcast.core.HazelcastInstance hazelcastInstance,
              long TTL)
        Initialize Session scope, call it from ApplicationFilter
        Parameters:
        hazelcastInstance - Hazelcast instance
        TTL - Max time while session can stay inactive (lastUsed in Context)

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Reset and clean all scopes

      • start

        public static java.lang.String start(java.lang.String id)
        Start new session scope (if already in scope - NOP)
        Parameters:
        id - Session id
        Returns:
        Same id if new session scope started or null if already in session scope

      • finish

        public static void finish(java.lang.String id)
        Finish session scope
        Parameters:
        id - Session id (if null or empty - NOP)

      • getContext

        public static SessionScope.Context getContext()
        Get current context
        Returns:
        Context (null if not in session scope)

      • retrieveSessionIdFromRequest

        public static java.lang.String retrieveSessionIdFromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
        Retrieves session id from request, if it is empty - puts it back to response
        Parameters:
        req - Request
        resp - Response
        Returns:
        Session id
